title: 1bedroom apartment for 2-3people
posting_body: This special place was completely renovated .1 bedroom with Queen size bed and the living room has a twin-size bed.1 bathroom.
Good for 2-3 people, located in the heart of SF - very close to Chinatown, Nob Hill, North Beach, Russian Hill, and Fidi.
Available for stays of 30 nights or more.
The kitchen comes with a dishwasher and a modern kitchen.
Note: difficult to find the parking space, no pets, no smoking
Muni #10 and #12 stop down the street.
10 minutes walking to Fidi and Union Square.
15 minutes walking to the Montgomery Bart station and SF Ferry Building
